item.title: Talk: Scalable Architecture From the Ground Up
Uno Platform 4.9: Media Player Element, WebView2 and Native Host Support for Skia
item.description: Uno Platform released version 4.9 of their framework for building native mobile, desktop, and WebAssembly apps. The latest version brings the MediaPlayerElement control and WebView2 support which are two community long awaited features. Also, beyond these additions, the release includes over 100 other improvements and enhancements, including the native host support for Skia.

item.title: Episode 124 - Breaking Up with Tech Debt: A Love Story with M. Scott Ford
item.description: M. Scott Ford and Jamie Taylor discuss the importance of software maintenance and the challenges that come with it. They highlight the potential risks of neglected dependencies and offer solutions such as the Freshli and the LibYear metric to track tech debt. The conversation also touches on the need for spaces for developers to exchange ideas and feedback, as well as the benefits of making small, incremental improvements to a project. This podcast is a must-listen for anyone involved in software development, as it provides valuable insights and solutions to make software maintenance more manageable and effective.
